nodes.text: Manufactured by Sienar Fleet Systems, Obsidian 10 was a TIE/LN starfighter serving the Imperial Navy's Obsidian Squadron, which was piloted by OS-72-10. By 4 ABY, Obsidian 10 was stationed aboard the Imperial-class Star Destroyer Thunderflare and was further recalled to defend the Imperial Death Star II battlestation during its construction in the Endor system.
Obsidian 10 was created in 1998 for the flavor text of OS-72-10's card in the Special Edition Limited expansion set of Decipher, Inc.'s Star Wars Customizable Card Game.
